vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συνανα-παύομαι,
passive, sleep with, γυναικί [Refs 1st c.BC+]; to be refreshed, receive comfort along with, ὑμῖν [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to find rest together, be refreshed together
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to find rest together, be refreshed together
to experience refreshment together, or rest in company with someone, Rom. 15:32*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: reposar con ; tener un momento de descanso con, disfrutar una visita refrescante con
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nghỉ ngơi với; an nghỉ với. σύν (G4862) + ἀναπαύω (G373)
